title: Microlearning Design for Strengthening Business Information Literacy

context.prior_knowledge: Completion of advanced courses and extensive practical experience in specialized fields
context.additional_context: Cultivating business research problem-solving skills through online tool utilization and practice-centered education

learning_goals: Learners can effectively search for professional materials in four core business databases (e.g., Bloomberg, Statista).
Learners can explain the step-by-step process of writing financial analysis reports using PDF and video materials.
Learners can apply information literacy skills acquired through microlearning modules to real business scenarios (e.g., market research).
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
